body:
I don't want to bump my (very) old topic about this (especially because it's changed a lot!), so I'll give this a refresh!



As you may recall, I'm running an osu! group on Skype; you can add me at milkcreamyum along with your MINECRAFT username so I know who it is. It's also preferred that you post here so I make sure I put you in the osu! group.

Recently, we need more osu! players; our current group has declined in activity :c

Full list of members (osu! username):
Milki (MilkFreedom)
BlackMetalGhost (rfandomization)
Xx_Maddy_xX (_Maddy_)
TheTNTPotato (TheTNTPotato)
Lunax564 (LightBeats)
Ambamore2000 (Ambamore2000)
FrostedCupcakez (TheEverest)
BALLZI (KANEKAI)
Cyclops (Robo16)
MLGtino (MLGtino)
ViolentBoo (ViolentBoo)
netox_max (Netox005)
Juano_ (JuanoMC)
Chiddybangmaster (diviniation)
Strafes_
Zoom (Boltt)
Emmaye (Emmaye)
iCarnage (_Vapour_)
Stimulating 
Nolan (Nolan)
KatLikesPie (KatLikesPie)

What is osu!?
osu! is a rhythm game for the PC based on clicking/tapping circles. Find more at www.osu.ppy.sh !
I hope that I'll see more people in this group soon! :D

title: Calling all osu! players!

replies.body: How much experience do I need with Osu? I've played a lot on iPhone, and recently started the PC version about two weeks ago.
replies.body_tagged: How much experience do I need with Osu? I've played a lot on iPhone, and recently started the PC version about two weeks ago.

replies.body: You just need to play osu and you're in, it doesn't matter how good you are.
replies.body_tagged: You just need to play osu and you're in, it doesn't matter how good you are.

reply_to.body: How much experience do I need with Osu? I've played a lot on iPhone, and recently started the PC version about two weeks ago.
reply_to.body_tagged: How much experience do I need with Osu? I've played a lot on iPhone, and recently started the PC version about two weeks ago.

replies.body: I started playing osu! recently, Fun, but I can only play the easier hard level maps rn.
replies.body_tagged: I started playing osu! recently, Fun, but I can only play the easier hard level maps rn.

replies.body:
It usually takes 2-3 months to get decent at it (Insane maps) - (HD, HR, etc), I used to play before but as I was a noob, I left it, then came back and I had some kind of thing with the game so I kept playing, now I even think it's better than MC.

;)
